formatDescription: Microsoft Powerpoint had a feature which would compile the document along with all media used into a single file, using the Cabinet archive format, but with a ppz extension, rather than the typical cab extension.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: Microsoft Powerpoint Packaged Presentation
internalSignatures.note: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes:MSCF{20}..*.(PPT|ppt)
